BREAKING: Hunter Biden Enters Open Guilty Plea in Tax Case; Sentencing Set for December  —  Hunter Biden entered an open guilty plea in a Los Angeles courtroom Thursday afternoon to nine charges brought against him in a federal indictment related to failure to pay income taxes and tax evasion.
